format:
body
body weight in kg.


brain
brain weight in g.


name
Common name of species.
(Rock hyrax-a = Heterohyrax brucci,
Rock hyrax-b = Procavia habessinic..)
reference:
Weisberg, S. (1985)
Applied Linear Regression. 2nd edition. Wiley, pp. 144–5.
title: Brain and Body Weights for 62 Species of Land Mammals
description:
Description
A data frame with average brain and body weights for 62 species
of land mammals.
